profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

Our focus is on Custom Basement Renovation projects, Kitchen renovations, Basement Finishing, Bathroom Renovation and Bathroom Remodeling, Home Additions, Second Story Additions, Rear Additions, Home Extensions and Rear Extensions.
 
We provide custom marble and tile install services as our marble and tile setters are highly skilled and detail oriented. We are the all inclusive General Contractor who will take care of all your design and general contracting needs.

profile:
For 35 years and counting, Tropical Insulation Inc., has been the best choice for blown in, loose fill cellulose insulation installations across Toronto, the GTA and Southern Ontario. Whether you are a Homeowner involved in remodeling, renovating or retrofitting your home, or an Industry Professional or Contractor looking for a reputable insulation contractor for your next project, we can deliver reliable and prompt service at a competitive price, using only the highest quality Canadian-manufactured cellulose insulation on the market today. 
With the cost of living skyrocketing, saving money by saving energy has never been more important. Heating and cooling costs can account for 50-70% of a home or building’s yearly energy expense. When installed correctly, insulation is the simplest and most cost-effective means to lower this energy use. Remember, sealing and ventilating your home correctly will not only keep you warm in winter but will also cool you down in the summer months… Insulation is the perfect four season solution to saving you money.
If you are working on a “Green Building” project, or consider environmental sustainability a factor in your decision-making when selecting an insulation installer, please contact us. We choose to install Climatizer Plus™ cellulose insulation for its superior thermal and acoustical performance as well as its environmental benefits. Climatizer Plus loose-fill cellulose is certified by UL’s ECOLOGO program; indicating that this product has undergone rigorous scientific testing, auditing, or both, to prove its compliance with stringent, third party, environmental performance standards and may help you contribute to LEED credit categories.   
Call us or “Get started today” on our website and allow us to provide you the information you need to make an informed choice for your home or building insulation needs.  We offer free in-home assessments and quotes.
service_area: Etobicoke, Mississauga, Oakville,  Brampton, Toronto, North York, Scarborough, Markham, Thornhill, Richmond Hill, Vaughan, Aurora, Newmarket, King City, Nobleton, Kleinburg
services: Installation providers of thermal and acoustical cellulose insulation in to attics and walls of new construction, custom, remodeled, or older homes (retrofits).
specialities:
Blown in Loose Fill Insulation
Drill and Fill Wall Injection
Sound Suppression

profile:
26 years experience in Structural Residential Framing. Load Bearing Wall Removals, New construction, Additions, Open Concept Living Spaces, Fire, Flood, Wind Damage, Insurance work and Basement Framing.
We appreciate that homeowners want the very best products and services available. We aim to do our very best with every job. 
From Demolition to finished product, No Job Is Too Small...we love it all!
service_area: Toronto, Hamilton, Vaughan, Halton Hills, Peel Region, Mississauga, Durham County, Greater Toronto Area
products:
With the cost of energy consistently going up and never down, homeowners and businesses are becoming more aware of greener and more sustainable energies. Adapting these energies to their homes and businesses at times requires modifications to the structure. "Rebuild the Planet" can do this for you. 
From a simple inspection to structural engineering and Structural Framing, no modification is too daunting. Clean and precise, following specifications of site plan approved drawings, all work is completed to your satisfaction.
services:
No job is too small. We take pride in all sorts of building projects and work closely with engineers and inspectors. Customer satisfaction is of primary importance, "YOU'RE ONLY AS GOOD AS YOUR LAST JOB" 
Our aim is to meet with you and discuss the scope of your project/renovation within 24 hours of initial contact.
We provide our services year round, happy to be of service.
specialities:
-Creating open concept spaces and layouts by removing load bearing walls and installing laminate and/or steel beams. 
-Removal of structure bearing post(s) in basements
-New home construction with the latest framing techniques
-Structural reinforcement to older homes
-Additions on front, top or rear of existing homes
-Basement framing and structural modifications to accommodate  greater square footage for more living space
-New builds from ground/foundation up.
name: Rebuild The Planet

profile:
Modular Home Additions has developed a revolutionary concept using sophisticated computer software and building techniques. In just days, a second storey addition or new home, custom designed to your needs, can be built. All structural building parts are designed and built in a climate controlled environment. This enables us to have a high quality level and build all year round without leaving your house vulnerable to weather conditions. There is minimal noise, dust and no mess.
Combining technology with excellent service, achieving your dreams is easier, faster and affordable. Using factory built components can save you up to 30% compared to conventional methods. And best of all, you are able to stay in your home during renovations without being inconvenienced. Our accurate quotation software ensures no hidden costs. This one-stop approach to renovating is a wise choice amongst many alternatives and gives you the optimum value for your home.

profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

profile:
Established in 2013, City EdgePoint Construction Inc. offers an extensive set of renovation, repair, and home management services.  We are experts in all types of Home Additions, Kitchens, Bathrooms, Basements, and from commercial renovations to residential remodeling, we provide a comprehensive resource for the GTA.

When you decide to renovate, you need a contractor with a detailed understanding of your project.  City EdgePoint takes an innovative approach that combines high service standards with superior customer service.  We keep you informed with regular progress reports, and each of our trade partners is evaluated through an extremely strict screening process.  When you want results, you need City EdgePoint.

Visit our website for more information.  To get a quote, call us today or send us an email.

profile:
CHC is the Canadian exclusive dealer for Patio Enclosures Products Proudly serving Ontario and not limited to Toronto, Surrounding GTA and Tri-Cites areas.
Patio Enclosures has been building and creating beautiful living spaces since 1966. We have had the opportunity to transform many dreams into reality by designing rooms where you can relax and your children can safely play. We have enjoyed being a part of homeowners’ lives and strive to continue to provide our customers with the best technology on the market.

This dedication and care has made Patio Enclosures the largest manufacturer and installer of Sunrooms, Solariums and Conservatories in the industry. As an award winning company, we take great pride in every new room or addition we produce. Patio Enclosures products are distributed to  branches, franchises and dealers to provide you quick service at a competitive price.

All of our Sunrooms, Solariums, Additions and Conservatories are designed and custom-manufactured in our factory. As a NARI certified remodeler, we work to make sure every product you receive from Patio Enclosures is the best quality and fit for your home. If your design requires special attention, one of our engineers will work closely with you to create and design a Sunroom, Solarium, Traditional Addition or Conservatory that works with your home, lifestyle and budget.
products: TRADITIONAL ADDITIONS | THREE SEASON SUNROOMS | FOUR SEASON SUNROOMS | SOLARIUMS | WHOLE FLOOR RENOVATIONS | WINDOWS & DOORS | BASEMENTS | CONSERVATORIES | ARCHITECTURAL DESIGN & PERMIT PLANS
services: Don't just renovate your home, rejuvenate your life with a Patio Enclosures brand sunroom, addition, solarium, renovation or any construction project. From modest to extravagant, our rooms are custom-designed and custom-manufactured to meet your needs, budget and lifestyle.

profile:
KP Construction is a design-build firm located in Toronto and specializes in home renovation, basement finishing, bath renovations, building of outside structures as decks, pergolas, and more. We provide clients with construction project management services from initiation to completion. Our company represents "best practice" regardless of the size and budget of a project.











Using the best available tools and latest renovation techniques, KP Construction creates functional kitchen spaces. You tell us what you want to have in your new kitchen, and we’ll show you how form and function can unite in the most beautiful way. Interesting, innovative, and eye-catching, our kitchen designs are carefully detailed. We consider all the work involved into the renovation to smooth the building process. From design to completion, everything will be carefully managed by our renovation experts.
services:
Custom Deck Design
Custom Deck Building
Basement Renovations
Kitchen Renovations
Bathroom Renovations
Home Additions
specialities: Home renovations require careful planning and construction processes. They need not only to meet the space requirements but should also integrate seamlessly with the existing house, to be consistent aesthetically and structurally. With a signature three-step process, KP Construction professionals take renovation projects from concept to concrete, delivering outstanding results.
